snippet: CHURCHILL--Ann Tobin, died unexpectedly on April 11, 2016, after a brief illness. She dedicated herself to helping others, as nurse, healthcare administrator, and member of her church and community. Ann gave extraordinary support, guidance, and comfort to her family. She is survived by her sisters, granddaughter, her nieces and nephews, step-children and many grand-nieces and grand-nephews. Memorial April 23 at 10am Church of the Incarnation, 206 Madison Avenue, NYC. 1/3
lead_paragraph: CHURCHILL--Ann Tobin, died unexpectedly on April 11, 2016, after a brief illness. She dedicated herself to helping others, as nurse, healthcare administrator, and member of her church and community. Ann gave extraordinary support, guidance, and comfort to her family. She is survived by her sisters, granddaughter, her nieces and nephews, step-children and many grand-nieces and grand-nephews. Memorial April 23 at 10am Church of the Incarnation, 206 Madison Avenue, NYC. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CHURCHILL, ANN TOBIN
